958537258075938816.text: “In confronting these dangers, we know that weakness is the surest path to conflict, and unmatched power is the surest means of our defense. For this reason, I am asking the Congress to end the dangerous defense sequester and fully fund our great military.” #SOTU

958537133647712257.text: “Around the world, we face rogue regimes, terrorist groups, and rivals like China and Russia that challenge our interests, our economy, and our values….”

958535728153100288.text: “It is time to reform these outdated immigration rules, and finally bring our immigration system into the 21st century.” @POTUS #SOTU

958533711615746049.text: “My duty, and the sacred duty of every elected official in this chamber, is to defend Americans -- to protect their safety, their families, their communities, and their right to the American Dream.  Because Americans are dreamers too.” #SOTU

958533580367581184.text: “So tonight, I am extending an open hand to work with members of both parties -- Democrats and Republicans -- to protect our citizens of every background, color, religion, and creed…”

958533455582810112.text: “But as President of the United States, my highest loyalty, my greatest compassion, and my constant concern is for America's children, America's struggling workers, and America's forgotten communities. …”

958533399597191168.text: “The U.S. is a compassionate nation.  We are proud that we do more than any other country anywhere in the world to help the needy, the struggling, and the underprivileged all over the world…”

958532101669834752.text: “As tax cuts create new jobs, let us invest in workforce development and let's invest in job training, which we need so badly.  Let us open great vocational schools so our future workers can learn a craft and realize their full potential.” @POTUS #SOTU
